intro: Lasianthus japonicus f. satsumensis, commonly known as the Satsuma lasianthus, is a flowering plant native to Japan. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant white flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and have a smooth texture. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its delicate appearance and pleasant fragrance.
